property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Planeswalker

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to any target. −X: Exile each permanent with mana value X or less that's one or more colors. −1[0]: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Chris Rahn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, you gain 1 life for each creature you control. {3}{W}: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Daniel Ljunggren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The changing of a single moment in Tarkir's past altered its future, rewriting its history.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Greg Staples

property.name: Rules
property.value: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ugin's magic reaches beyond the dragons. The clans have adapted it for war.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Johann Bodin

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Bird Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Morph - Reveal a white card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Watcher of the Roost is turned face up, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jack Wang

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Monk

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jeskai Infiltrator can't be blocked as long as you control no other creatures. When Jeskai Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, exile it and the top card of your library in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Cynthia Sheppard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of their library. (That player puts the top card of their library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Howard Lyon

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Monk

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mystic of the Hidden Way can't be blocked. Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are many different paths. The Great Teacher reveals them all."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ryan Alexander Lee

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top two cards of your library. Manifest one of those cards, then put the other on the top or bottom of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yeong-Hao Han

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weakness exists within all who are not dragons.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Slawomir Maniak

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Human Wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your enemies may be cowardly, my lord, but one should never call them gutless."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Seb McKinnon

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Zombie Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sultai Emissary dies, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Mathias Kollros

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The ainok are wild dogs, not fit to join us around the fire." - Surrak, the Hunt Caller

property.name: Artist
property.value: Evan Shipard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lightning burns the dragon's path.

property.value: Anger can empower those who embrace it.

property.value: Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Jeering Instigator is turned face up, if it's your turn, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Willian Murai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Arashin War Beast deals combat damage to one or more blocking creatures, manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.value: Manifest the top card of your library, then put a +1/+1 counter on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only if you've cast another spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their origins are shrouded in mystery. I believe they are the protectors of the lost secrets of our world." - Jilaya, Temur whisperer

property.name: Artist
property.value: David Seguin

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ugin's Construct enters the battlefield, sacrifice a permanent that's one or more colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While trapping the Eldrazi on Zendikar, Ugin learned little from Sorin, but he gleaned the rudiments of lithomancy from Nahiri.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Peter Mohrbacher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another permanent enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Supplicants offer flesh and silver, flowers and blood. The altar takes what it will, eyes gleaming with unspoken promises.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Erica Yang

property.name: Rules
property.value: Briber's Purse enters the battlefield with X gem counters on it. {1}, {T}, Remove a gem counter from Briber's Purse: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bigger the hand, the higher the price.

property.name: Artist

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: If you fear the dragon's fire, you are unworthy to wield it.
